name: Arc Phone
rules: Look at the top card of your deck. You may switch that card with 1 of your face-down Prize cards. (The cards stay face down.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Arezu
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 Evolution Pokémon that don't have a Rule Box, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (Pokémon V, Pokémon-GX, etc. have Rule Boxes.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Box of Disaster
rules: If the Pokémon V this card is attached to has full HP and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, put 8 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Colress's Experiment
rules: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put 3 of them into your hand. Put the other cards in the Lost Zone.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Damage Pump
rules: Move up to 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon to your other Pokémon in any way you like.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Fantina
rules: You can use this card only if you have 10 or more cards in the Lost Zone.During your opponent's next turn, all of your Pokémon take 120 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon V (after applying Weakness and Resistance). (This includes Pokémon that come into play during that turn.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Iscan
rules: Draw 2 cards. If your Active Pokémon has “Hisuian” in its name, draw 2 more cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lady
rules: Search your deck for up to 4 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lake Acuity
rules: All Pokémon that have any Water or Fighting Energy attached (both yours and your opponent's) take 20 less damage from attacks from the opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Lost City
rules: Whenever a Pokémon (either yours or your opponent's) is Knocked Out, put that Pokémon in the Lost Zone instead of the discard pile. (Discard all attached cards.)
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Lost Vacuum
rules: You can use this card only if you put another card from your hand in the Lost Zone.Choose a Pokémon Tool attached to any Pokémon, or any Stadium in play, and put it in the Lost Zone.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Mirage Gate
rules: You can use this card only if you have 7 or more cards in the Lost Zone.Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards of different types and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Miss Fortune Sisters
rules: Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck and discard any number of Item cards you find there. Your opponent shuffles the other cards back into their deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Panic Mask
rules: Prevent all damage done to the Pokémon this card is attached to by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon that have 40 HP or less remaining.

name: Riley
rules: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck and have your opponent choose 2 of them. Discard the chosen cards and put the remaining cards into your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Thorton
rules: Choose a Basic Pokémon in your discard pile and switch it with 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Tool Box
rules: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. You may reveal any number of Pokémon Tool cards you find there and put them into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Volo
rules: Discard 1 of your Benched Pokémon V and all attached cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Windup Arm
rules: The Pokémon this card is attached to can attack even if it's Asleep or Paralyzed.

name: Gift Energy
rules: As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides Colorless Energy.If the Pokémon this card is attached to is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, draw cards until you have 7 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Solar Shot
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Eerie Glow
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned and Confused.

attacks.name: Magical Fire
attacks.text: Put 2 Energy attached to this Pokémon in the Lost Zone. This attack also does 120 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Rapid Freeze
attacks.text: Attach any number of Water Energy cards from your hand to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Magnetic Tension
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to the new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Splitting Beam
attacks.text: This attack also does 30 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Instant Charge
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw 3 cards. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Scrap Short
attacks.text: Put any number of Pokémon Tool cards from your discard pile in the Lost Zone. This attack does 40 more damage for each card you put in the Lost Zone in this way.

abilities.name: Instant Charge
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw 3 cards. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Scrap Short
attacks.text: Put any number of Pokémon Tool cards from your discard pile in the Lost Zone. This attack does 40 more damage for each card you put in the Lost Zone in this way.

abilities.name: Guardian of Love
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's Pokémon's Abilities done to each of your Pokémon that has any Psychic Energy attached, except any Enamorus V.

attacks.name: Blossom Tail
attacks.text: Attach up to 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Benched Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Rock Crush
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rock Crush
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rising Sword
attacks.text: This attack does 50 more damage for each Prize card you have taken.

attacks.name: Buster Swing
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

abilities.name: Wild Style
abilities.text: This Pokémon's attacks cost Colorless less for each of your opponent's Single Strike, Rapid Strike, and Fusion Strike Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Dynamic Tail
attacks.text: This attack also does 60 damage to 1 of your Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Feelin' Fine
attacks.text: Draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Treasure Rush
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each card in your hand.

attacks.name: Feelin' Fine
attacks.text: Draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Treasure Rush
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each card in your hand.

attacks.name: Abyss Seeking
attacks.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put 2 of them into your hand. Put the other cards in the Lost Zone.

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Abyss Seeking
attacks.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put 2 of them into your hand. Put the other cards in the Lost Zone.

attacks.name: Shred
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Slip-'n'-Trip
attacks.text: Your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rolling Shell
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Vanishing Wings
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, you may shuffle it and all attached cards into your deck.

attacks.name: Flight Surf
attacks.text: If you have a Stadium in play, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Arezu
rules: Search your deck for up to 3 Evolution Pokémon that don't have a Rule Box, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. (Pokémon V, Pokémon-GX, etc. have Rule Boxes.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Colress's Experiment
rules: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put 3 of them into your hand. Put the other cards in the Lost Zone.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Fantina
rules: You can use this card only if you have 10 or more cards in the Lost Zone.During your opponent's next turn, all of your Pokémon take 120 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon V (after applying Weakness and Resistance). (This includes Pokémon that come into play during that turn.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Iscan
rules: Draw 2 cards. If your Active Pokémon has “Hisuian” in its name, draw 2 more cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lady
rules: Search your deck for up to 4 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Miss Fortune Sisters
rules: Look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck and discard any number of Item cards you find there. Your opponent shuffles the other cards back into their deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Thorton
rules: Choose a Basic Pokémon in your discard pile and switch it with 1 of your Basic Pokémon in play. Any attached cards, damage counters, Special Conditions, turns in play, and any other effects remain on the new Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Volo
rules: Discard 1 of your Benched Pokémon V and all attached cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.name: Glaciated World
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may discard the top card of your deck. If that card is a Water Energy card, attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Frost
attacks.text: You may discard any amount of Water Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 50 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Magnetic Grip
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Item cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Electro Star
attacks.text: This attack does 90 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Lost Dive
attacks.text: Put the top 3 cards of your deck in the Lost Zone.

attacks.name: Ancient Star
attacks.text: Until this Pokémon leaves play, it gains an Ability that has the effect “Your opponent's Pokémon V in play, except any Aerodactyl VSTAR, have no Abilities.” (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

abilities.name: Hazard Star
abilities.text: During your turn, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Paralyzed and Poisoned. During Pokémon Checkup, put 3 damage counters on that Pokémon instead of 1. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Lost Impact
attacks.text: Put 2 Energy attached to your Pokémon in the Lost Zone.

attacks.name: Star Requiem
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if you have 10 or more cards in the Lost Zone. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

abilities.name: Moisture Star
abilities.text: During your turn, you may heal all damage from this Pokémon. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Rolling Iron
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 80 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

abilities.name: Phantom Star
abilities.text: During your turn, you may discard your hand and draw 7 cards. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Ticking Curse
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each of your Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.

abilities.text: During your turn, you may discard your hand and draw 7 cards. (You can't use more than 1 VSTAR Power in a game.)

attacks.name: Ticking Curse

name: Box of Disaster
rules: If the Pokémon V this card is attached to has full HP and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, put 8 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

name: Collapsed Stadium
rules: You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Dark Patch
rules: Attach a basic Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Darkness Pokémon.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Lost Vacuum
rules: You can use this card only if you put another card from your hand in the Lost Zone.Choose a Pokémon Tool attached to any Pokémon, or any Stadium in play, and put it in the Lost Zone.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.
